parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The content of the configuration template. The value must be in the format that is specified by the Format parameter.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the configuration template. The description can be up to 255 characters in length.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description:
The data format of the configuration template. Valid values:

*   JSON: JSON format
*   XML: XML format
*   YAML: YAML format
*   Properties: .properties format
*   KeyValue: key-value pairs
*   Custom: custom format

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the configuration template. The name can be up to 64 characters in length.
